name: Todo List App should allow me to add todo items
title: Todo List App should allow me to add todo items

testSteps.description: Alice starts with an empty todo list

children.description: Alice ensures that website title does equal 'Serenity/JS TodoApp'

testSteps.description: Alice records an item called 'buy some cheese'

children.description: Alice enters 'buy some cheese' into "What needs to be done?" input box
Alice presses key Enter in "What needs to be done?" input box
Alice waits up to 5s, polling every 500ms, until displayed items does contain 'buy some cheese'

testSteps.description: Alice ensures that displayed items does equal [ 'buy some cheese' ]
Alice records an item called 'feed the cat'

children.description: Alice enters 'feed the cat' into "What needs to be done?" input box
Alice presses key Enter in "What needs to be done?" input box
Alice waits up to 5s, polling every 500ms, until displayed items does contain 'feed the cat'

testSteps.description: Alice ensures that displayed items does equal [ 'buy some cheese', 'feed the cat' ]
Alice ensures that persisted items does equal displayed items
